text: Simone Loiodice (born March 16, 1989 in RomeUEFA Europa League - Simone Loiodice – UEFA.com) is an Italian professional football player who currently plays for APD Loops Ribelle.Career summary by tuttocalciatori.net ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:San Marino Calcio players Category:Expatriate footballers in San Marino Category:Association football midfielders
